page.title: 03ENGLISH CHINA CLAY (cont)
page.content: Stent, or waste rock exposed by the monitors is removed from the bottom of the pit by dumper trucks so that fresh pit faces are always being used. The mixture of water, sand and clay goes to the lowest point of the pit, and is pumped to the sand separation plant. The coarse sand is removed, and the water, mica and sand are pumped to the cyclone separators. More of the mica is then removed, and the slurry is passed to dewatering tanks. More refining then removes the remaining sand and mica which are pumped to the settling lagoon. The clay is then refined further. The clay is then sent to storage tanks and then to filter presses, and is dried in rotary driers, such as those at Par.
